description: An uncommon but divine flavour combo, strawberries, basil and sumac marry beautifully in this fresh and summery salad. The perfect side to your alfresco feast.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Strawberry,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Jan Feb 2021,Peanut free
name: Sumac, Strawberry & Basil Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, halved, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place vinegar, oil and sumac in a bowl and stir to combine. Season.
Arrange strawberry, onion and mozzarella on a large plate. Drizzle with dressing and serve scattered with basil.
